articles.title: Silent Hill 2 leaks for Xbox via Microsoft Store with November release date - TrueAchievements
articles.description: After plenty of rumors and speculation, the Microsoft Store has now leaked Silent Hill 2 for Xbox Series X|S and PC via a new listing.

articles.title: Halo Infinite's Next Major Update Will Be Its Last So Halo Studios Can Focus on 'Multiple Halo Titles in Development' - IGN
articles.description: Microsoft has announced plans to put Halo Infinite into maintenance mode later this month so developer Halo Studios can focus on working on multiple new Halo games.

articles.title: Brain Decoder Translates Visual Thoughts Into Text - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A new brain decoding method called mind captioning can generate accurate text descriptions of what a person is seeing or recalling—without relying on the brain's language system.
